General.Name: Opnet Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: OPNET Technologies Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and markets telecommunication network access and optical transport equipment worldwide. Its access network products include DLC/E1-MUX/IP-MUX, MSAN/SVG, Mini-DSLAM, VoIP gateway, and GPON; and transmission network products comprise CWDM/DWDM/ROADM, carrier grade switching platform, fiber optical multiplexers, TDMo PSN, Ethernet over PDH, and G.SHDSL.bis bridges/routers. The company also offers enterprise network products, such as EPON; distribution network products that consist of telecom cables, ODF/FDC, FOSC, FDP/FDB, and box panels, as well as accessories; and submarine cable systems, including submarine power, submarine optical fiber, optical fiber composite submarine, special underwater, and high voltage power cables, as well as transoceanic communication system accessories. In addition, the company provides fiber optic sensor solutions; and supports network planning, installation, training, and maintenance services. It serves incumbent fixed-network operators, mobile operators, cable TV operators, utility companies, enterprises, and military entities. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 5 Industry East Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30075
